website_summaries.verdict: The Blue Microphones Mo-Fi is a well-made, wonderful-sounding headphone pair for the serious music lover.
pros: Extremely powerful audio output, with excellent bass response and high frequency clarity
Cool retro design with innovative compression band for secure fit
Can be used in passive and active modes, as well as active with enhanced bass response
cons: The bulky design isn't for everyone, and some aspects, like the Power switch, could use a little tinkering
Bright sound signature not for everyone

customer_reviews.title: A new contender has
customer_reviews.text: The first impression by the looks of this device is astonishing, innovative and very premium! Not rubbish at all, even from its price value standpoint. I've listened several music genres and it never let down at all frequencies. Even though, on amp-mode "off" these headphones sounds phenomenal and crystal clear, without mentioning turning the amp-mode "on"! It's like you're at in the middle of the soundstage, while listening music. By my opinion, one of the best headphones on the market right now. Many users complain about the heavyweight issues, but however I do like it somehow. It's every penny worth it and I think I may call this as a worthy statement. Good job Blue!!! 👍
customer_reviews.author: Stephan Schultink

customer_reviews.title: Unique headphones
customer_reviews.text: Love these headphones. Rich sound, I could hear instruments in the music I never noticed before. I did not find it too heavy and the pads are deep enough so my ears where away from the speakers. Very beautiful design, solid and well built. I use them in passive mode as one of my studio monitoring cans, and with the iPhone/iPad. I really enjoy listening to music on the Mo-Fi.
customer_reviews.author: Flame

customer_reviews.title: Worth the investment.
customer_reviews.text: My teenage son did a lot of research before saving up to invest in these headphones. He finally got them and was over the moon! I got to try them out listening to some jazz and yes, definitely worth the price, (although less expensive would have been great). Clarity and good sound and I like the way they fit on the head and ear. He's currently designing a moulded form oak box to store them in. Yes, he'd better look after them....
customer_reviews.author: Sonia W.

customer_reviews.title: first impressions are excellent, along with a very good design and they ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these Blue headphones as a present for my son, first impressions are excellent, along with a very good design and they look very good to. The sound quality is exceptional reaching all music levels. The headphones also feel good and are very comfortable. A great product.
customer_reviews.author: Ian Davison

customer_reviews.title: Big Phones the Biggest Sound
customer_reviews.text: I don't have any complaints about these. I thought my Bose QC20i earbuds were giving me very good sound, but these brining so much more. Mofi is big put very comfortable. Pono music player together with Mofi's builtin amplifier can play my music really really loud. Everything sounds great rock, acoustic, techno and jazz.
customer_reviews.author: vkm

customer_reviews.title: Probably the best set of headphones I have ever owned (and I've ...
customer_reviews.text: Probably the best set of headphones I have ever owned (and I've had a few!!). Was looking for a good set to wear while working on my own music and replace my broken pair of Sony's from years ago. These are really comfortable for longer sessions, and the sound is fantastic. Even without the powered settings they are still great. Highly recommended if you are serious about your audio!
customer_reviews.author: Paul Gully

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Stunning sound quality. Comfort a little compromised by shape of ear cushioning.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Walder

customer_reviews.title: great sound. Can be a bit sticky in hot ...
customer_reviews.text: Lovely object, great sound. Can be a bit sticky in hot weather! My glasses arms can get in the way!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Slough

customer_reviews.title: A beast to be reckoned with...literally.
customer_reviews.text: I an't be as excited on my over pricey on the ear products anymore. These are just amazing to be used at home listening to music and watching films on my laptop. 4 start for being SUPER heavy!
customer_reviews.author: ProdigalGil

customer_reviews.title: The build quality is brilliant.
customer_reviews.text: Sound is quite neutral. I think that was the intention of the developer. But I found myself wanting more from it. The build quality is brilliant.
customer_reviews.author: NeilLee

product_meta.title: Blue Microphones Mo-Fi Powered High-Fidelity Headphones with Integrated Audiophile Amplifier
product_meta.description:
Mo-Fi is the first headphone that delivers real audiophile performance and sound quality on every device-from professional studio gear to laptops, tablets and even your phone. Oh, and we completely reimagined how it fits on your head, so you'll get both optimal sound and listen-all-day comfort. Because trust us, you'll want to. Mo-Fi is the first headphone that combines a built-in audiophile amplifier and insanely great-sounding drivers for a truly mind-blowing listening experience. Sure, this means Mo-Fi can get loud. But more importantly, it allows for the most accurate sound reproduction-so you'll always enjoy great-sounding audio, on every device. Frankly, it's surprising no one ever thought of this before-but hey, we're Blue. Innovation is what we do best. Mo-Fi is no ordinary headphone. From the multi-jointed design to earcups shaped-gasp-like ears, we completely reimagined the form and functionality, without any preconceived notions about what headphones are supposed to look like. The result feels less like a headphone, and more like a high-quality instrument you can wear. Some call it radical. We just call it Mo-Fi. Unlike other headphones that put more bass in your face whether you want it or not, Mo-Fi lets you choose the right sound for your music. No DSP tricks here - this is analog, baby. No matter if you're listening to 70s-era rock, modern pop, orchestral, hip-hop or something else, you'll have total control over your listening experience.


Main Features

 * Output power:240mW
 * SNR, self noise:> 105 dB
 * Noise:< 20 uV
feature_bullets: Sealed over-ear design for superior isolation and feedback prevention
User-adjustable tension and suspension adapt to any head shape and size for a perfect fit
Racecar-inspired multi-jointed headband design keeps earcups parallel at all times for superior comfort and sound

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.0 out of 5 stars168 ratings4.0 out of 5 stars
